# Example

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var foo = require( 'foo' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

```javascript
var foo = require( 'foo' );

// Usage example
foo();
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
